item.description:
• BIG UPDATE:
  • feat: Year progress indicator showing percentage of year completed
  • feat: Monthly events list with relative day labels (आज, भोलि, X दिन)
  • feat: Custom menu bar date format — pick which components to show (Weekday, Day, Month, Year) and reorder them freely
  • feat: Cleaner navigation header with simplified controls
  • feat: Centered header layout
  • feat: Toggle Year Progress and Events List from Display settings
  • fix: Removed unused "Update Available" menu bar format option
  • fix: Past events now visually faded in events list

• UI Improvements:
  • feat: Year progress indicator showing percentage of year completed
  • feat: Monthly events list with relative day labels (आज, भोलि, X दिन)
  • feat: Cleaner navigation header with simplified controls
  • feat: Centered header layout
  • feat: Toggle Year Progress and Events List from Display settings
  • fix: Removed unused "Update Available" menu bar format option
  • fix: Past events now visually faded in events list
